Package scientific_cal.SciCal

Class SCalci

  • java.lang.Object
    • scientific_cal.SciCal.SCalci
  • public class SCalci
extends java.lang.Object

    Scientific Calculator

    is an advanced calculator which is different from a regular calculator.This calculator includes extra buttons.All of this extra button allow you to work with various kinds of numbers and problems such as :
    • Trigonometry problems
    • Scientific numbers that have a multiplication by 10 to a certain power
    • Ï€ problems
    • Logarithm problems with base 10 and the natural base
    • Probability problems that use the factorial function
    Our scientific calculator contains :

    Buttons :-

    Numeric buttons ïƒ  from 0 to 9. Arithmetic buttons ïƒ  ( + , - , x , / ) Trigo buttons ïƒ  ( Sin , Cos , Tan , SinInv , CosInv , TanInv ) Mod button ïƒ ( % ) Log button ïƒ  ( log , ln ) Parentheses button ïƒ  ( ( , ) ) All clear button ïƒ  ( AC ) Equal to button ïƒ  ( = ) Factorial button ïƒ  ( x! ) Radio button ïƒ  ( Radian , Degree ) Root button ïƒ 

    Panels :-

    Main Panel Calculation Panel

    To implement the scientific calculator we imported different classes from specific packages which includes.


    ->BorderLayout , Color , Component , Dimension , Font , Graphics , GridBagConstraints , GridBagLayout , Insets , ActionEvent , ActionListener
    ->classes from [AWT Package]
    ->ArrayList from[UTIL Package]
    ->ButtonGroup , JButton , JFrame , JLabel , JPanel , JRadioButton , JTextField , SwingConstants , Border classes from[Swing Pakage]
